indexer.api.server.index

Interface BaseIndexer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseIndexer

    public interface BaseIndexer
    Author:
    lion Suitable interface to implement Indexers

    • Method Detail

      • addToIndex

        void addToIndex(java.lang.String html,
                java.lang.String url)
        Add a content to the index, whatever mechanism used for implementation, Ex, Database, Files, etc
        Parameters:
        html - the content to be indexed
        url - the url where was found that content

      • search

        java.lang.Object search(java.lang.String query,
                        org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable page)
                 throws IndexerNotMatchesException
        Execute a search query on the index
        Parameters:
        query - the query
        page - A convenient way to get pagination on client request
        Returns:
        It returns an object, to allow classes implement this interface design response based on specific requirements
        Throws:
        IndexerNotMatchesException - if not results were founds

      • clearIndex

        void clearIndex()
         throws java.lang.Exception
        Clear the index entirely
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if something went wrong

      • getStats

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getStats()
        Returns:
        Indexer statistics, in map format, :, Ej, totalWords: 45
